original_title: National Chamber to host B2B meetings tomorrow with 10-member delegation from India
original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka in association with the Global Fortune (GF Mission India) India, will conduct a B2B session for the Sri Lankan corporate/business community to explore trade and investment opportunities in Sri Lanka on Tuesday, 23 May at 3:00 p.m. the National Chamber Auditorium.

Business delegates are consisting of importers/exporters and potential investors from the industries of Agriculture, Food & Beverages sector such as rice, pulses, spices, dairy products, fresh vegetables and fruits, dry fruits, cereals, tea and coffee, sugar, bakery products, processed food, ready to eat, cooking oils, soya products, sweet, flour, beverages and all other agri commodities.

If you are interested in attending the Business Forum and the B2B meetings, you are kindly requested to contact the National Chamber Nishanth / Thushari (011 4741788 / 2689600 / 076 2555707) or send a request to [email protected]; [email protected]
Allocation of B2B appointments will be on first-come-first-served basis, due to limited number of meetings that could be accommodated.
